DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES To determine effect 3 exercise intervention sarcopenic index among community-dwelling older adult high osteoporotic fracture risk . MATERIAL AND METHOD The current study enrol subject screen high risk fall , osteoporosis/fracture standardize questionnaire FRAX . Subjects National Taiwan University Hospital Bei-Hu Branch ( NTUHBB ) randomize integrated care group ( ICG , target n=50 ) muscle train group ( MTG , target n=50 ) . Subjects Lingko Chang Gung Memorial Hospital ( LCGMH ) assign X-box group ( XBG , target n=30 ) . All participant receive CD-ROM one education osteoporosis , sarcopenia , frailty , fall prevention , nutrition , cop strategy another hour professional lead exercise program . ICG subject received weekly group exercise MTG subject receive twice weekly machine-based resistence training major muscle group . XBG subject rececived twice weekly exercise X-box base program . Major outcome muscle mass ( measure bio-impedance analysis ) , grip strength , walk speed , low leg extension power baseline 12-weeks intervention .
